solution_line_template: Blanche found {blanche_red_glass} pieces of red and Rose found {rose_red_glass} pieces of red for a total of {blanche_red_glass}+{rose_red_glass} = <<{blanche_red_glass}+{rose_red_glass}={total_red_blanche_rose}>>{total_red_blanche_rose} pieces of red

Dorothy found twice the amount of red as her friends so she has {multiplier_dorothy_red}*{total_red_blanche_rose} = <<{multiplier_dorothy_red}*{total_red_blanche_rose}={dorothy_red_glass}>>{dorothy_red_glass} pieces of red sea glass

Rose found {rose_blue_glass} pieces of blue sea glass and Dorothy found 3 times that amount so she had {rose_blue_glass}*{multiplier_dorothy_blue} = <<{rose_blue_glass}*{multiplier_dorothy_blue}={dorothy_blue_glass}>>{dorothy_blue_glass} pieces of blue glass

Together, Dorothy found {dorothy_red_glass} red and {dorothy_blue_glass} blue so she had {dorothy_red_glass}+{dorothy_blue_glass} = <<{dorothy_red_glass}+{dorothy_blue_glass}={dorothy_total_glass}>>{dorothy_total_glass} pieces of sea glass.
